00035 int DeadTimeGe::ProcessEntry(TGlobalData *gData, TSetupData *gSetup){
00036   std::string detname = "Ge-S";
00037   AnalysedPulseList detA_pulses = gAnalysedPulseMap[detname];
00038   AnalysedPulseList::iterator currentDetAPulse = detA_pulses.begin(); 
00039 
00040   if (timediff_plots.find(detname) == timediff_plots.end())
00041   {
00042         std::string histname = "h" + detname + "_" + GetName();
00043         std::string histtitle = "Time difference between to consecutive pulses on " + detname;
00044         TH1F * htimediff = new TH1F(histname.c_str(), histtitle.c_str(), 
00045                         1e6, 10, 4.2e7);
00046         htimediff->GetXaxis()->SetTitle("Time [ns]");
00047         htimediff->GetYaxis()->SetTitle("Arbitary unit");
00048         timediff_plots[detname] = htimediff;
00049   }
00050   
00051   std::vector<double> detA_times;
00052   for (AnalysedPulseList::iterator detAPulseIter = currentDetAPulse;
00053                 detAPulseIter != detA_pulses.end(); ++detAPulseIter) 
00054   {
00055         double detA_time = (*detAPulseIter)->GetTime();
00056         detA_times.push_back(detA_time);
00057   }
00058   
00059   for (unsigned int i = 0; i < detA_times.size()-1; ++i)
00060   {
00061         //printf("%.2f %.2f %.2f\n", detA_times.at(i+1), detA_times.at(i), 
00062                         //detA_times.at(i+1) - detA_times.at(i));
00063         timediff_plots[detname]->Fill(detA_times.at(i+1) - detA_times.at(i));
00064   }
00065   return 0;
00066 }
